page.title: 16INDOOR GAMES IN BURGHFIELD
page.content: Despite many activities in the village ,some children prefer to stay indoors. Here are some games played by a pupil at Garland Junior School. "'Snakes and Ladders'is a popular game in which there is a board with 100 squares.Drawn on it are snakes and ladders,each linking two squares.You throw a dice and if you land at the bottom of a ladder,you go to a higher number,but if you land on a snake,you go down.The winner is the first to reach 100. "A game I play on my computer is cal- led 'Race'.The player is on a pink motorbike,and has to dodge lots of on- coming blue cars.If you get hit you lose. "'Snap'is a game using ordinary play- ing cards or special cards.As you put the cards down,you shout 'snap!'if you see two cards the same."
